Functions
ht32f5xxxx_ebi.c File Reference

This file provides all the EBI firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_ebi.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

void EBI_DeInit (void)
 Deinitializes the EBI peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void EBI_Init (EBI_InitTypeDef *EBI_InitStruct)
 Initializes the EBI peripheral according to the specified parameters in the EBI_InitStruct.
void EBI_StructInit (EBI_InitTypeDef *EBI_InitStruct)
 Fills each EBI_InitStruct member with its default value.
void EBI_Cmd (u32 EBI_Bank, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the EBI peripheral.
FlagStatus EBI_GetBusyStatus (void)
 Check whether the specified EBI busy flag has been set.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the EBI firmware functions.
